ThingDef.label: solar bodysuit
ThingDef.description: A full solar bodysuit made of sunsteel crystalline fiber. It is light and thin, but surprisingly sturdy.

ThingDef.label: solar modular security armor
ThingDef.description: The solar configuration of the Greydale modular body protection system, the "Warrior II" security armor provides modest protection for most body parts. If you have the proper equipment, It can be reassembled into other armor.

ThingDef.label: solar security helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet of the "Warrior II" solar security armor. A simple and robust protection gear.

ThingDef.label: solar modular pioneer armor
ThingDef.description: A solar armor designed primarily for combat engineer, Greydale "Laconian II" pioneer armor has integrated tool set. It's a pretty good gear for builds something while gunfight.

ThingDef.label: solar pioneer helmet
ThingDef.description: A helmet of the "Laconian II" pioneer armor. A simple pain damper system integrated.

ThingDef.label: solar modular nomad armor
ThingDef.description: "Akicita II", the long-range solar scout variant of the solar "Warrior II" modular body protection system. This outfit recycles the wearer's body waste and moisture, provides heat and cold protection and sound dampening, and assists the wearer with servo motors and a lightweight exoskeleton. The wearer needs less sleep, moves faster, hunting quieter. Originally designed as a protective device for explorers, guerrillas and caravans of rimworlds soon realized the amazing potential of the equipment.

ThingDef.label: solar nomad helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet of the "Akicita II" solar nomad armor. Its long-range observation equipment can also be used for aiming.

ThingDef.label: solar modular Medic armor
ThingDef.description: Designed for combat medics, the "Hospitaller II" solar armor is the medical variant of the "Warrior II" solar modular body protection system. The armor is equipped with a variety of medical tools and supplies, so the wearer can treat the injured in the field.

ThingDef.label: solar medic helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet of the "Hospitaller II" solar Medic armor. The built-in AI medical interface assists the wearer during medical procedures.

ThingDef.label: solar drop suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Solar Drop Suit model 412f, 'JanYeong(shadow remains) II'. Built for the YeonHwa Aggresive Marketing Division's drop troops, this completely enclosed suit is designed to perform low orbit jump action. Its integrated long-ranged jump pack makes JanYeong ideal equipment for the rapid insertion mission.

ThingDef.label: solar dropsuit helmet
ThingDef.description: It is a state-of-the-art solar helmet, optimized for EVA and orbital drop operations. This helmet has lots of shiny gadgets. Of course, all of these flashing toys are useless in the surface environment except the targeting assist pseudo A.I.

ThingDef.label: solar strike suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Strike Suit model 383a, 'ChangWol(Azure Moon) II'. Designed for urban strike teams, this sophisticated suit have short-ranged, fast jump thrusters for rapid assault. In order to maximize the operational capacity of this suit, the wearer requires fast reaction speed and exceptional boldness.

ThingDef.label: solar strikesuit helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet of the delicate solar strike suit. Sophisticated nerve assist system inside this helmet makes the wearer act faster.

ThingDef.label: solar assault armor
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-heavy solar protective armor, "Bjorn II" cladded with layers of composite sunsteel-weave and reactive armor plates. The wearer of this armor is practically become a walking tank. This armor achieved tremendous protection at the expense of moving speed. It has an integrated short-range EMP grenade launcher.

ThingDef.label: solar assault helmet
ThingDef.description: Rugged and trustworthy solar helmet of the solar assault armor.

ThingDef.label: solar fire support armor
ThingDef.description: If you need a walking turret, call the "Varg II" solar fire support armor. Rapid reloading system, additional ammo container, built in fire control system, everything of the "Varg II" focused on fire support. In return, the Varg is very vulnerable to close combat.

ThingDef.label: solar fire support helmet
ThingDef.description: Solar helmet of the solar "Varg II" fire support armor. Share the features with the fire support armor.

ThingDef.label: solar artillery armor
ThingDef.description: A solar variant of the "Varg II" solar fire support armor, the "Korp(Raven) II" artillery armor originated from modified makeshift equipment of frontlines. All unnecessary equipment was removed from Korp to mount a huge mortar, "Crow feeder." The purpose of this equipment is simple; turn the wearer into walking artillery. The only ammunition this mortar can shoot is high-explosive shells.

ThingDef.label: solar reflactor carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Nemesis II" is a powered armor that created to hunt the Federation remnants. Almost immune to the heat energy, the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent provides this armor to their elite hunters.

ThingDef.label: solar reflactor helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet with a complete set of heat deflector system.

ThingDef.label: solar hazard carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Alecto II" solar hazard carapace is designed to carry out mission even in the worst environment. In extreme cold area, in a heat wave, and even in radioactive wasteland, Tisiphone hunters can continue their endless hunting.

ThingDef.label: solar hazard helmet
ThingDef.description: A solar helmet of an "Alecto II" hazard carapace. This helmet provides excellent environmental protection.

ThingDef.label: solar close combat armor
ThingDef.description: Solar power armor with a built-in shield, "Excelsior II" is a close combat focused power armor with maneuverability, durability, and lethality.

ThingDef.label: solar close combat helmet
ThingDef.description: Solar elmet of a "Excelsior II" close combat armor. It assist wearer with neural close combat enhancement system.
